attributes.action: Ask the Queen to refuse assent to withdraw from the EU until a new vote is held.
attributes.background: The Leave victory with no qualified majority is too narrow to warrant such a huge constitutional change to our country. Furthermore, many people have since publically changed their mind. Scotland & Northern Ireland by voting to remain, also need a constitutional settlement to heal her riven Kingdom.

rejection.details: We cannot accept this petition as you are asking the Queen to do something, rather than Parliament or Government.
